title: Add password-protected management login

requirements.text: Add password validation for Management role login. When a user selects the Management role during profile setup, require them to enter the password '*#Sindoor@2025'. Do not allow Management profile creation if the password is incorrect.

quotes: Yadi management login kare to key password mein *#Sindoor@2025  k bina login nahi ho

acceptanceCriteria: ProfileSetupModal displays a password input field when Management role is selected
Password field is not shown for Student or Marketer roles
Submit button is disabled or shows error if password does not exactly match '*#Sindoor@2025'
Management users cannot complete profile setup without correct password
Error message clearly indicates incorrect password when validation fails

constraints: Do not change the backend schema or add password storage to the backend
Password validation must happen only in the frontend during profile setup
Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Role-based access control beyond profile setup
